Open Technologies
Environment
Climate Risk Index
The annually published Global Climate Risk Index analyses to what extent countries have been affected by the impacts of weather-related loss events (storms, floods, heat waves etc.).
Elements: Environment, Risk Index

Visit API Docs

Global Surface Temperatures
The planets average surface temperature has risen by about 0.9 degrees celsius since late 19th century with the six warmest years recorded since 2014. This is a dataset pulled from behind the United Nations data visualizations.
Elements: Environment, Temperatures

Visit API Docs

Green House Gases
This provides a set of resources for pulling data about green house gases, allowing you to pull by country, per capita, CO2 trends, and global CO2 and CH4 concentration.
Elements: Environment, Green House Gases, CO2, CH4

Visit API Docs

Oceans
With oceans absorbing much heat, glacier retreating, and ice sheets shrinking, the sea level is rising. Global sea level rose about 8 inches last decade with the rate doubling in the last two decades (NASA). This collection provides a set of resources about the impact of climate change on our oceans, pulled from behind the different United Nations visualizations.
Elements: Environment, Green House Gases, CO2, CH4

Visit API Docs


About

This is the landing for the portion of the Postman Open Technologies program that focuses on open environmental data, putting APIs to work to make data available for use in applications. This area is all about showcasing open data providers, the data the providers, and helping them the valuable resources they possess more accessible.

Visit the Open Technologies
Environment Workspace
